short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to easily save and load groups of websites via pinned tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Saved Pinned Tabs is your blazingly fast and effecient tool to switch context in the browser 🔥😱🥳

Use the simple interface to save your current pinned tabs with a easy to remember name 🧠(emojis reccomended! 🎉)

Quickly open your Saved Pinned Tabs with CMD+SHIFT+P for MAC 🖥️ or CTRL+SHIFT+P for Windows🪟 Tab to your saved group and hit enter to switch context! 🏎️ Mice optional! 🐭

Have a lot of groups? 🤹 Start typing in the extension to instantly filter your groups down! 🔫 (now that's fancy 🎩)

I hope you enjoy your new, highly productive world with Save Pinned Tabs! 💖🚀
